text: (innum, ivarkalutaiya utaranam:) Oru saittanutaiya utaranattaiyum ottirukkiratu. Avan manitanai nokki ‘‘ni (allahvaiyum avanutaiya tutaraiyum) nirakarittuvitu'' enru kurukiran. Avvare avanum nirakarittu vittan. (Pinnar, saittan avanai nokki) ‘‘niccayamaka nan unnaivittu vilakivitten. Enenral, ulakattarin iraivanakiya allahvukku meyyakave nan payappatukiren'' enru kuruvan
